data.name: Jane
data.quote: Photography is not just about capturing moments; it's about preserving feelings, emotions, and stories that deserve to be remembered.
bio: I've been fortunate to turn my passion for photography into a journey of capturing life's most precious moments. What started with a simple camera and endless curiosity has evolved into a deep love for visual storytelling.

Based in New York but always eager to travel, I specialize in wedding photography, intimate portraits, and creative personal projects. My style blends candid photojournalism with artistic composition, always focusing on authentic emotions and natural beauty.

When I'm not behind the camera, you'll find me exploring hidden city corners, experimenting with film photography, or sharing my knowledge through photography workshops. Every shoot is an opportunity to create something unique and meaningful.

data.title: Capture Your Story
data.description: Whether you're planning your dream wedding or looking to create stunning portraits, I'm here to help you preserve these precious moments.
Professional wedding photography in New York. Capturing authentic moments and genuine expressions in natural and studio settings.

data.description: Every portrait session is an opportunity to capture the essence of who you are. Whether it's for professional headshots, family portraits, or creative personal projects, I focus on creating images that reflect your authentic self while maintaining artistic excellence.
